> <OLD>
>
> Even if he hadn't already been subservient to CRYOTEK and HYDRAS, DINOBOT
> would have taken these actiosn with relish.
>
> "GLadly."
>
> And with that, he went to charge in over towards ANTAGONY!  The move over
> was a classic Metallikido charge, his long blade arm up and over his head
> then for a powerful downward swing.
>
> But, the swing would be a decoy, intent on drawing ANTAGONY's guard upwards,
> where the true blow would land - in this case, a powerful forward kick!
>
> And if she was moving to dodge the kick then or would try and evade to the
> side, then power would change over to the sweep of the clawed tail-sword to
> use it's superior range and buzzsaw properties to lash out at her while she
> was on the defensive!
>
> As well as with a slight backup motion now where if he was engaged in
> grappling her at close range or she would try and match him strength for
> strength of trying to shoot his otpic blasts into her face!

<NEW>

[BAD-AFT}

There is only one word that can describe the speed, power and skill
that was brought to bear on DINOBOT!

It was is she could read his mind, or better yet, as if she knew every
move he was about to make before he made it. Spin, dodge, duck, block,
feint!

She move and stuck with such lighting speed and agility that was
difficult to follow never mind match! Leaping through the air as a
blade seemed to flash out from no where and block DINOBOT's attack!
She flew back with a defensive kick as she moved.

She was both defense and offense moving with a strange fluid grace!

Landing on the ground several meters behind where she stood before her
blade now in her right hand spinning as she readied it, ANTAGONY
oriented her blaster at DINOBOT with her left!

ANTAGONY looked at the others, "Are you guys idiots! I tell you that
your universe is about to tear apart and you want to capture me?"

"Of course." CRYOTEK said. "After all, we cannot know what other
secrets you are hiding from us." He manipulated a device in his hand,
the very same one he used to shut down TARANTULUS' weaponry a few
moments ago. "Such as how to turn such a thing to our own advantage."

Behind ANTAGONY a pair of steel cables began to snake forward with
manacles opened up as if to capture her. However at the moment
ANTAGONY did not appear to be aware of as her focus seemed to be on
DINOBOT as she watched him for another attack!

(TAG)

- Preston
